entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:50 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -20.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -20.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -22.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
